title: Gameplay - Orange Rocket Girl Tristana Does Not Load (Chroma Pack)
body:
Repro 2/2.   It will revert back to the original Rocket Girl Tristana. 

> #yordlepower

replies.body:
Hey DJ COMMANDER,

Thanks for the report! 

We've seen issues where chroma packs aren't loading and are reverting to the base. We're still currently investigating the issue and locating the root cause. 

I was able to successfully load in with the orange Rocket Girl Tristana when creating a custom game. I use the Koi Nami Element chroma pack pretty frequently and I've personally not had issues with them - I always make sure to re-select the chroma I want while in champion select. It's a crappy workaround for now, but it's helped ensure I load in with the chroma I'd like.
